name: @yigitkonur/latitude-deno-sdk
description: Latitude Deno SDK - Community fork of the official Node.js SDK, rebuilt for Deno and Supabase Edge Functions

tasks.version:patch: deno run -A jsr:@deno/semver-bump patch deno.json && git add deno.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version"
tasks.version:minor: deno run -A jsr:@deno/semver-bump minor deno.json && git add deno.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version"
tasks.version:major: deno run -A jsr:@deno/semver-bump major deno.json && git add deno.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version"
